name: The Island of Olonnais
description:
Small Open World in Tropical Island with Day/Night Cycle, Wild animals, hunt, Craft, Build and some fantastic adventure.

Please, leave me your opinion about the game.

Is Free for philosophical reason.

/////////////////////////////////

The Olonnais warmly thanks those who managed to release the curse.

Look left before the arrival of help in the boat. ;)

This is "The Island of Olonnais", a free powerfull little survivor game inspired by The Forest, Slender and Far Cry.

You are the only survivor of a shipwreck and you run aground on an unknown island ...

Do you believe in ghosts ?

A simple chef, you're not rambo, whatever?

Hunt, Fight, Craft, Build and more:

Use your environment to survive, hunt and craft.

To make your home you need the “Building Plan”, the “Building Plan” is crafted with “Leather”, is can be obtain on the “Boar”, if you burning the “Leather”in the “Furnace” you obtenaid a “Cloth”.

Beware of the Tiger.

And you need a wood Bucket “Water collector” to recover water from the rain, and for prepare the meat find on the “Boar” or the “Chicken” craft a “Campfire”, for good weapon and ammo use the “Furnase” to transform your resources.

For the future I will try to incorporate underwater wildlife, swimming and fishing with more variety of enemies and some surprise…

The game is on Alpha version, everything is not integrated, map is not finish, no save etc.

If you have a clipping with the enemys and animals, upgrade your setting in game menu.

You can support the development if you want.

Thanks for playing and good luck... :)

The Olonnais warmly thanks those who managed to release the malecdiction !

Look left before the arrival of help in the boat. ;)
